snippet: Suspected Islamist militants attacked a major Pakistani air force base with links to the country’s nuclear program in the early hours of Thursday, sparking an exchange of fire that lasted several hours.
abstract: Suspected Islamist militants attack a major Pakistani air force base with links to the country's nuclear programs; attack sparks an exchange of fire that lasts several hours; at least one militant is killed and several other wounded.
lead_paragraph: Suspected Islamist militants attacked a major Pakistani air force base with links to the country’s nuclear program in the early hours of Thursday, sparking an exchange of fire that lasted several hours.

headline.seo: Attack on Pakistani Air Force Base With Nuclear Ties
headline.main: Pakistani Air Force Base With Nuclear Ties Is Attacked
headline.print_headline: Militant Killed in Attack on Pakistani Air Force Base
